大家好，

東華校園蘊含許多永續元素，待您挖掘、分享與傳遞。
歡迎報名參加「在東華看見永續系列-1 短文短語徵選活動」，動手撰寫與一或多項 SDGs 呼應之500（含）字內短文及20（含）字內短語，並拍攝照片，就有機會實體化作品，還能獲得特優 5,000元禮券或等值獎品喔。

報名截止日：2024年11月18日23:59
活動詳情請掃海報QR-code或信件附檔。

Dear all,

The NDHU campus is full of sustainable elements waiting for you to discover, share, and pass along.

We invite you to participate in the “SDGs in NDHU - Part 1: Short Essay & Phrase Contest.” Write a short essay of up to 500 words and a phrase within 20 words related to one or more SDGs. Capture three photos to accompany it, and you could have your work featured in print and win a top prize of NT$5,000 in vouchers or equivalent prizes!

Registration deadline: November 18, 2024, 23:59. 
For more details, scan the QR code on the poster or see the attachment.

Thank you for your participation!

李莉莉 Li-Li Lee
國立東華大學 永續發展中心
Center for Sustainable Development
